Exclusive Crypto Fund market participant Trading Offer

Crypto Fund investor, based in Switzerland and established in November 2022, is a crypto-only prop trading firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps and Instant programs. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MT5, Match investor, CFT Platform and Bybit. The firm offers over 500 tradable instruments with leverage of 1:100. certified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
